job_purpose: Join as a Senior Full Stack Software Developer to build new features & products using React, TypeScript, Django, and Azure, contribute to technical direction, mentor junior developers, own delivery workflows, and support customer deployments.
job_duties_and_responsibilities: Build new features & products using React, TypeScript, Django, and Azure
Contribute to technical direction, product roadmap, and solution architecture
Mentor junior developers, run code reviews, guide best practices
Own delivery workflows – from ticket to deployment
Stay 70–80% hands-on: ship clean, production-ready code
Support customer deployments and ensure system stability
required_qualifications: 3+ years in a Senior Software Engineering role
Experience with modern web frameworks (Django, Rails, Laravel, .NET etc.)
Strong front end skills with React or similar frameworks
Solid experience in CI/CD, cloud platforms (ideally Azure) and DevOps
A collaborative mindset and excellent communication skills
preferred_qualifications: Bonus points if you’ve built for Microsoft Teams or the M365 ecosystem
company_details: Our client is an independent software vendor with big ideas and a people-first approach. They are growing fast with exciting new features, AI tools, and Teams integrations on the way. The company values curiosity, trust, and fun, offering a modern, Microsoft-native tech stack and a remote-friendly work environment.
